title: Paint Brush Alley
desc: Paintbrush Alley Market Days was established in the Spring of 2021, featuring local artist, small businesses, craftsmanship, homemakers, food vendors and more. Paintbrush Alley Market Days blossomed a beautiful relationship with Art in Uncommon Places. Together, we have been able to create some amazing events with the local art of Downtown San Angelo as the focal point. With each event, there are over 60 vendors in attendance.

title: San Angelo Food + Wine Festival
desc:
We’ll pour wines and craft beers from near and far to pair perfectly with food from the best West Texas chefs, restaurateurs, artisan producers, and crafters. You don’t want to miss this signature event.

Your ticket covers tastings of the food and beverages. Come and enjoy a great night with great food, booze, and music!

title: San Angelo Food Truck Festival
desc: The San Angelo 2nd Annual Food Trucks Festival is a family-friendly event that will take place on June 9th, 2018 from 11 AM to 6 PM at the Lake View Bible Church in San Angelo, Texas. The festival is focused on local food trucks and aims to provide an opportunity for people to enjoy some quality family time, live music and activities while sampling great local food. The event is sponsored to keep costs minimal for attendees, and there will be door prizes given out all day long, as well as a mobile adoption from "Critter Shack Rescue" for those looking to adopt or foster a dog in need. Free parking is available at the San Angelo Rodeo Association across the street at the Spur Arena.
